title: 0x0000005 Error

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Hey everyone, I recently encountered this error, 0x0000005 and I can't find a fix for it. I sent a ticket to riot but I want to try and fix this in the meantime. It pops up instead of the loading screen after champ select. If anyone has had this error before and has fixed it, I would appreciate some help :)
Thanks, glhf

replies.body:
It's possible that the patcher itself (or the installation) might be corrupted or be having issues and isn't able to launch itself.  In order to get this resolved, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Patching Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues).  There are a fair amount of steps there, but it should prevent this from appearing in the future!

Feel free to reply back and let me know if it doesn't help!
